topics.body:
"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559c72346368721fe000020b#post_559c72346368721fe000020b
It's a creepy good suspense/mystery anime.

The plot is that a famous person who is stressing out about her new deadline for a project one night is hit in the head by a kid with a bat and roller skates; the police thinks she's lying but then there's a mass epidemic of people getting hit.  The entire time you know she's fucking lying, but what is she lying about and who is attacking all the people?
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
